# Security Policy

**PLEASE DON'T DISCLOSE SECURITY-RELATED ISSUES PUBLICLY, [SEE BELOW](#reporting-a-vulnerability).**

## Supported Versions

Version | Security Fixes Until
--- | ---
1.0 | December 1st, 2022

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability within HiperPrecios, please send an email to Juan Manuel Cort√©z at juanm.cortez@gmail.com. All security vulnerabilities will be promptly addressed.
